RestPeriod: Brief breaks every 5-10 min if fatigue rises
Progression: Add 3-5 min to a session every 2–3 weeks provided no prolonged soreness
Supervision: Begin in temperature-controlled setting with physiotherapist; monitor perceived exertion & hydration

Progression: Increase resistance ≤10 % when 12 reps are completed without undue fatigue; avoid high-load eccentric work
Supervision: Initial sessions with physiotherapist to ensure controlled tempo and joint protection

Progression: Gradually extend stretch holds to 30 s; add diaphragmatic breathing sets as tolerated
Supervision: Follow individualized home programme from physiotherapist or respiratory therapist
